meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, he drouks a few beers to relax.
meanings.sent2: She often drouks with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun that they drouked until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent4: His sorrows drouked in the bottom of the bottle.
meanings.sent5: The image of him drouking alone in the dimly lit bar stuck in her mind.

meanings.sent1: The store had a wide selection of drouks for the party.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed tasting different drouks at the wine festival.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with delicious drouks for the outing.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with various drouks from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the drouks filled the room, enticing everyone to try some.
